mocafe.fenut

fenut stands for ‘FEniCS Utils’, so this subpackage contains a variety of utility classes and methods for managing Phase Field Models simulations.

It is composed of the following modules:

  • log, which manages the creation of useful log files with the help of the logging Python module.

  • mansimdata, which contains methods to manage simulation data and generate simulation reports.

  • parameters, which contains classes and modules to manage simulation parameters.

  • solvers, which contains some useful default implementation of FeniCS solvers.

  • fenut, which contains general-purpose classes and methods.

You can find full documentation for each module in the “Submodules” section below.

Submodules

  • mocafe.fenut.fenut
  • mocafe.fenut.log
  • mocafe.fenut.mansimdata
  • mocafe.fenut.parameters
  • mocafe.fenut.solvers
